attributes.action: Support the US and international efforts to arrest the Ugandan war criminal Joseph Kony
attributes.additional_details:
- Support in any way possible the search and arrest of Joseph Kony, a Ugandan war criminal who has taken over 30,000 children to be made sex slaves and child soldiers, involving the mutilation of many civilians.

- Support the Invisible Children project which is working to raise awareness and funds for Kony's capture by the end of 2012.
